website_summaries.verdict: The BLU Win HD's lack of LTE and poor camera performance may deter some, but it's the best sub-$200 unlocked Windows phone we've tested so far.

customer_reviews.title: Was happy with it until the battery stopped holding charge after almost 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked flawlessly for almost three months, I was quite happy with it but now the battery has suddenly stopped holding charge. As it's outside the returns policy period of Amazon I'm stuck with contacting the manufacturer now. Not very happy, I'd recommend buying another phone as this is very poor reliability. Pros Big bright screen Simple to use Decent photo quality Cons Battery failed after 2 months which is outside of the Amazon return policy. Need to contact the manufacturer now.
customer_reviews.author: Funkay

customer_reviews.title: Good smart phone
customer_reviews.text: Screen - nice clear display. Control - nice responsive screen. Camera - an elderly person takes nice clear pictures with it. Speed - Really good, no performance issues. Surfing - You can surf the net on it easily. Phone calls - It also works as a phone really well.
customer_reviews.author: George63

customer_reviews.title: Real Value for Money and great features for the price charged
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value at under £50 every bit as good as the Microsoft Lumia 535 (Smashed screen) that it was replacing but with the added bonus of being Dual Sim AND Upgradeable to Windows 10 (Which I did straight away) not a popular OS by Android or my worst nightmare OS (Apple) but it is for use someone who isn't bothered about Tech really but understands MS Windows so its's a perfect choice and still gives you so many more options and features and way less restrictions than Apple OS every could. Really does do everything it says on the tin and so much more..... also it just seamlessly works together with the PC's without any effort or fuss
customer_reviews.author: Sixkiller SVU

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this smart (ha-ha! ) phone like the P***** A total ...
customer_reviews.text: Frozen in time. No time at all, just FOUR months down the line! Avoid this phone like the P***** A sad waste of money. Activated with delight on Christmas morning... Two months later no ring tone! The yellow BLU devil only vibrated. Kept missing calls. Naught to be done. Aaaarg! Attributed the fault to my techno ineptitude. Learnt to live with the silent phone. Two months on, the whole caboodle froze. FOREVER. Couldn't even 'slide-frame-down' to switch off. A super phone to start with, but my advice being, don't take a chance and buy this...
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Inrok

customer_reviews.title: £50 or £600 i expect the phone to work
customer_reviews.text: Cheap phone and some good reviews so I got one for my 12 year old daughter 3 months ago. It looks nice and with win10 I hoped for good things but it's a waste of £50. The phone has too many problems like freezing and locking up. As we speak the phone won't respond to presses on th screen. Reset it 3 times and still the same. Spend a bit more and get a better more reliable phone
customer_reviews.author: J R.

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars is not Enough**********
customer_reviews.text: Wow didn't expect this. Its amazing. Very slim about 7mm,screen is amazing ,fast start up, comes with screen cover and case ,bonus. Just can't believe the price £50 in sale I have iPhone and I think apple robed me . Update took only 10 minutes ,DOESNT come full of malware or advertising. Green looks cool ,and definitely a stand out from the boring metallic/black iPhones Get it before the price rise ,I see the price in Americas gone up to $110
customer_reviews.author: Sincity

customer_reviews.title: my first windows phone and so far so good
customer_reviews.text: very pleased so far updated software twice no problems. screen very clear and large which for me with failing eyesight is why I got it. works quickly and long battery life. the only thing I miss is sound level indicator when changing volume in call. takes two micro Sims and micro sd card which all work. not the strongest build but for the price seems a bargain. got the yellow fed up with boring black and not as easy to lose it.and you get a nice gel case and screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: James Redford

customer_reviews.title: Its performance and spec were amazing for its cheap price
customer_reviews.text: The phone was working perfectly. Its performance and spec were amazing for its cheap price. Unfortunately, last week the phone stopped working/charge even I have never used it. Just left it as a back up phone and kept charging it regularly every week. Now i am waiting for the refund
customer_reviews.author: Salah Eddine El Mennouny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Does what it says on the box. Love being able to use 2 sim cards which is great when travelling as it means you can use a local card wherever you are and pay a lower rate per minute.Also I bought it at a great price. How can Amazon sell this much technology for such a low price? I would have liked a manual included but I have now downloaded one.
customer_reviews.author: Frameworkman

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone less than a month and it has crashed. The battery won't recharge, though the charger still works. Waste of cash. Overall, it was a reasonably good phone until it wasn't. Different operating system means a lot of apps aren't available but I didn't see that as a major issue - quitting after two or three weeks though is unacceptable
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: All round this is a great phone for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the money. Operating system is smooth and reliable. Internet pages and apps are fast to load. When linked to the car (New model BMW) through Bluetooth the phone allows me to send text's via voice and dial numbers from the contacts. This is totally hands free and done when pressing the talk button on the steering wheel. It will tell you when you receive a text message and who it's from, then it will give you the option of reading it or not through the cars's audio system. Dictation is good, however sometimes it need a couple of attempts to get it right when road noise is a little loud, Great feature that I wouldn't have expected,
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone for the money
customer_reviews.text: Even at full price this is an excellent phone! I am very impressed with build quality - it feels absolutely awesome next to Lumia 930 which was much much more expensive. Lightning deal price makes it impossible to beat! No Android comes close in reliability at this price point - and you would probably need to spend at least twice as much for an equivalent Android device, that is spec wise - I doubt it would feel half as nice as this one.
customer_reviews.author: torrez

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I currently have a Lumia 930 which I bought last year for £440. This BLU Win HD is amazing for a fraction of the price. I bought this on a whim for my wife whose iPhone 4S was giving up the ghost. I just haven't seen a phone of this quality and spec for anything like this price. Was used to Windows so set up was so easy. Great phone, and I tech-sceptical wife likes it too! Works great on EE 4G network in the UK
customer_reviews.author: Ken, Portsmouth

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant device very handy not having to carry two handsets! Don't know why I ever bought android Android IOS in the past which are so much more expensive and don't offer anything extra?! and it came with a case and screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Mr P Fordham

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Love the screen very sharp the phone is fast and does not lag. Love the Microsoft os so much easier than ios or android cant wait for the win 10 update. Wifi range is not that good that's why it gets 4 stars from me. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect budget phone
customer_reviews.text: Perfect budget phone, I have all my social apps installed on the device and still running really smooth. I also have a 64GB MicroSD card in the device and is working seamlessly. Amazing value and the Windows OS is a welcome change and nice suprise, Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robbo3

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: got this for my son is a very fussy person in general and he actually loves the phone, the only thing he didn't like is the lack of snapchat on Windows phones at the moment, apparently it will be out soon for windows phones,apart from that it is a very nice phone, the screen is lovely with bright vivid colours and it takes decent photos too.Installed facebook,messenger,skype and youtube without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Techie74

customer_reviews.title: Value for money oops phone packed in after 6 months of use, re assess my view, Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: exceptional phone for the money, does all that many phones do that are way more expensive, only negative, manual is not very comprehensive. EDIT after use phone packed in, continually freezing and therefore not usable, to be fair to Amazon the reimbursed full price for this heep of junk, have since bought a Samsung phone which is brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Gracow

customer_reviews.title: Phone looks and performs like phones costing in the hundreds but at a fraction ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt sure about this phone at the start moving over from Android but it does everything i needed Android to do. Phone looks and performs like phones costing in the hundreds but at a fraction of that price. To begin with there were a few Microsoft niggles such as random reboots but as soon as i allowed the updates this phone has been flawless and super fast ever since. Battery power is phenomenal and of course you can tweak it further in the settings but i can get into the third day with my use. Dual sim but i only use my Vodafone contract sim at the minute with no issues. Im very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's great, best phone I've had and the other half ...
customer_reviews.text: Boy, this was a cheap buy. I wanted to see if I could get on with Windows phone, so wasn't about to spend a lot of money. It's great, best phone I've had and the other half gave up her IPhone to get one too. As a techie I found it really easy, the surprise was so did she!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: great mid range phone for a pretty penny
customer_reviews.text: Great phone with amazing functionality. windows 8 is fast and reliable (I have the standard chat apps-viber,whatsapp, facebook and the music apps like spotify) battery is built into the phone just so you know.
customer_reviews.author: Paraic Tomas

customer_reviews.title: The best phone at £50
customer_reviews.text: One of the best, or even the best, smartphone in terms of quality vs price, specially when it in a half price sale. The smartphone is quick and fluid, the screen is bright and sharp, the sound quality is reasonable, the network reception works without any problem. The only downsides are the camera, which is not the best one but certainly the best at that price, and the lack of some apps in Windows Store, but that is a fault of the Operating System and not of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: JReviews

customer_reviews.title: Fantasic
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the money. The whole phone is really well done. Tge screen us clear and the speed is good. Puts most top end phones to shame. Just goes to show how much you pay for the names on the phones and not what it does. Cant believe how cheap this is cor what you get. Any1 who buys this will be well happy
customer_reviews.author: Alan S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Alternative for Lumia 640
customer_reviews.text: An affordable alternative to the Lumia 640. The phone is well built and is Win10 ready also it comes with screen protector and case included in the box. The only downside is that the cameras struggle in low light but hey the phone is half the price of Lumia 640!
customer_reviews.author: M.A.C

customer_reviews.title: If you want a good smart phone go Blu
customer_reviews.text: What can I say I am so pleased with my Blu phone so far no complaints. The Battery last longer than some other phones I have had. The phone is easy to use and is sim free so it is up to you. I have put music and photograps on the phone and have downloaded apps and have not been dissapointed. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Canadian

customer_reviews.title: Pay the extra £40 for an entry level android.
customer_reviews.text: Whole section of screen stopped responding can't unlock anymore, just an expensive paperwieght with all my notifications still going off all day. I don't know if this is windows wide or just BLU but whenever I try to unlock the device (and fail because its think I'm pressing 4 not 7 it will double your lockout time, currently at 64 minutes before I can attempt to press the 7 & 0 which is where the screen is defective. This device looks good on paper but poor in practice. This is most annoying because I only received it early december.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Healey

customer_reviews.title: Incredible and unbelievable...
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible device... great screen, duel sim, upcoming windows 10 upgrade. Unfortunately mine had a single dead pixel and was sent back but I may purchase it again as it's that good. You get a phone case that looks really good, headphones and screen protector too... unbelievable for the price... I found the phone to be fast and although it doesn't have a full HD screen you wouldn't know it as the screen looks very sharp. I don't think you'll find a better deal to be honest.....
customer_reviews.author: Alan’s Review

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone, amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone, amazing value, I bought myself a £10 32gb, sd and now have all the room for apps and music I need. The phone it's super speedy feels great in the hand and looks great, was impressed by the screen too. Bu could easily sell this phone for £100 more, go grab yourself a bargain our treat yourself to an in expensive stocking filler
customer_reviews.author: Steve W

customer_reviews.title: BLU Win HD 5" 4G Dual SIM-Free Smartphone -...
customer_reviews.text: reasonably happy with the phone but there are still some teething problems, many of the network providers don't provide support for this phone YET, mine vodafone is one of them so even though there is no problem actually using the phone on the network some features I'm having problems with, ie texting to multiple contacts and sending picture messages, not managed to sort it yet. Otherwise everything seems fine. Oh and I did order a new phone from AMAZON but the phone they sent me already had about sixty contacts listed on it. Mainly Asian names and numbers, not sure where they came from???
customer_reviews.author: david spann

customer_reviews.title: amazing battery life
customer_reviews.text: As a device I can find no fault, clear display, amazing battery life. I am not liking Windows, there are not enough apps yet (but this is personal preference no reflection on the device) The device I would definitely recommend it is awesome value for money
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic individual

customer_reviews.title: She's delighted with it for the price - and 20 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a cheapish handset to replace the 1 year old HTC my daughter lost. She's delighted with it for the price - and 20 year old girls are difficult to please with stuff like this. Her main issue is that, so far, she hasn't managed to find a cover for it. It does come with a gel cover, but this isn't quite blingy enough for her. I know it a small issue (no big deal to me at all) but appearance seems to be important to young folk and this might put some off what is otherwise a fab phone for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Really impressive
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a new phone for a while and hesitated a long time before buying that one. After a month I'm quite happy with my purchase: It's fast enough, colours are good,reads video,the battery lasts about 2 days without intensive use or easily 1 day. It arrived with protection shell and a screen protector as well. The camera is alright.the screen tends to have little definition lines when it's a full and single colored image but it's not noticeable while watching videos or playing. Overall very happy with it.will see how it ages
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really poor quality phone
customer_reviews.text: Really poor quality phone. I have gifted this phone to my mom and she is not impressed with it. the voice quality is terrible. WhatsApp voice struggle as well. overall a poor phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the phone. For such a small price it feels good, doesn't feel cheap at all, screen is nice and bright. Haven't used it for long but so far it's been really good. Will update this in few months.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: It was a mobile phone which belonged to someone who ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a mobile phone which belonged to someone who did not clear or reset it or clear the information on it 'I cannot use it although I took it to someone to have it cleared .The contacts, messages and photos keep coming back even if I try to delete the personal info.
customer_reviews.author: Myself

customer_reviews.title: useless battery!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item and within 4 months the battery is no longer holding a charge, I have tried using different chargers thinking that was where the issue was but its definitely the phone. Spend a bit of extra cash on a phone that has a battery that will last longer than 4 months!! Unfortunate as the phone is actually decent with only the dreadful battery letting it down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: If you want a phone and a music/video player with wifi, bluetooth, camera then this is 1st class. It is windows which is very good. If you want every app that is available buy an android and pay 10 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: aitch jay

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with original one. Amazon immediately replaced, before I had returned it. No problems with replacement. Very easy to set up and use. I have eye problems and arthritic fingers. Phone immediately picked up graphic choices from my pc and Cortana is A+++ for voice recognition. Extremely cheap for what I got. Also it's 4G LTE whatever that is, but very good and fast wifi connections.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain phone.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little phone. So cheap for a reliable and neat device. I bought this for my son and he was very happy with it. Windows could do with some more Apps though.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Duck

customer_reviews.title: Lovely phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great item, I'm an older person so it took me a little while to get use to the navigation round all the features but super phone. It even matches my car!! Needs a case for me as I'm out and about with horses in all weathers but that's my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: BLU is the way forward for all phones.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution to expensive mobiles. This does everything it needs to and very well. Window OS is fine to work with (having come from Apple) and everything synced perfectly through google. The screen is the best thing - large and bright. It is also very light and the battery lasts better than my iphone. BLU should not be underestimated. Everything you need is in the box including screen protector and cover. Great phone at a great price. Would definitely buy BLU again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money phone with dual sim functionality big ...
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money phone with dual sim functionality big screen . though windows phone is not very user friendly but defiantly value for money you cant go wrong with 60£ phone
customer_reviews.author: mustansir kasim

customer_reviews.title: touchscreen is not very responsive which is not great. Internet connection is not as reliable as my ...
customer_reviews.text: ok smartphone for price . However , touchscreen is not very responsive which is not great . Internet connection is not as reliable as my previous phone ( same sim card ) . Also , downloaded games from app store do not work properly , either stopping midway , or very slow . Camera is ok , and large screen is great .
customer_reviews.author: AMOS1

customer_reviews.title: Battery failed after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Good first impression as phone appeared well made and easy to use and dual sim set up is a boon BUT (as others have found) battery fails after about 4 months making the phone useless. AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dudleston

customer_reviews.title: the price asked easy be treble what I payed for
customer_reviews.text: Mine came yesterday, and so far I am massively impressed with, first time with windows based phone, was previously on an android . If it had a big name brand on it, the price asked easy be treble what I payed for it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Christmas, by April started removing charge instead of adding when on charge, now at end of April is worse, unusable now and no return policy available 😥
customer_reviews.author: a patchett

customer_reviews.title: Performance is faster than a Lumia 735 but the graphics performance in games is pretty poor, for the price I can accept that
customer_reviews.text: Bang for buck! Performance is faster than a Lumia 735 but the graphics performance in games is pretty poor, for the price I can accept that. It comes with a screen protector and a case too which is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful phone and comes with a case!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. I haven't used it as it was a gift, but I opened the box and the phone is beautiful, with a large screen and comes with a beautiful case.
customer_reviews.author: PoPkiss

customer_reviews.title: ... phone came quickly was packed very well and works fine no complaints
customer_reviews.text: First phone came quickly was packed very well and works fine no complaints, the second order however has taken a little longer I'm very impatient so will be relieved when it turns up. The phone is light weight brightly coloured and is great 😊
customer_reviews.author: Sam Grout

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone, build quality excellent
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant phone, build quality excellent, clear bright screen, and recognised my lexar 633x 95mbs 128gb microsd card. Very happy with the phone , and received next day from amazon, Wish it came with wall charger though, not included in the box contents , and not listed in contents either, will have to buy one. Does come with screen protector and gel case same colour as phone though
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Has everything she needs on this phone and overall I've had no complaints of her so extremely pleased about that
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a christmas present for my sister and she loves it. Has everything she needs on this phone and overall I've had no complaints of her so extremely pleased about that. Would recommend to some friends and to new buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Shann

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Windows 8.1 phone!!
customer_reviews.text: What a cracking phone, have downgraded from iphone 6, this phone is amazing, not only a 10th of the cost of an iphone, comes complete with case and screen protector, can even use a 64GB micro SD card, is very versatile, and very responsive, had mine for a few days now, best buy in years, very Happy!! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Darren G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Smart Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great dual sim phone. Easy to use and a great smart phone at a fraction of the cost of more expensive options and platforms.
customer_reviews.author: Paddyk

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good generally
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good generally, but camera rather basic, and screen color fidelity clearly inferior to more expensive handsets like iPhone 6 and Samsun Galaxy S5. Bought as an experiment to try to get a workable Windows phone in Japan using SIM from DoCoMo phone. Completely compatible with Japan network, so overall very happy. Using as daily phone in preference to other options.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for money (49.99). No problem, works on Slovak LTE also. Battery life very good. Camera - okay for cheap phone. Maybe touchscreen sensitivity could be just a bit better. Sometimes it shows weak WiFi signal where Lumia shows full (2-3 brick walls from router), however speed test shows the same speed at those places. It is beautiful and protective case is also very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No way to get support
customer_reviews.text: Purchased at Christmas , thought I would try Windows. Upgraded to Win 10 a couple of months ago - All worked fine - (in call volume low) Last weekend phone stopped working - continuous reboot and windows sad face. Tried everything and unfortunately without anyway of getting support (US service desk no response to tweet or email) the phone is now going in the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Walsh

customer_reviews.title: nice big screen
customer_reviews.text: alfer looking and the I phone and how you are tied into it, I went for a windows phone, so, it was just plug and play with my comp, i added a sd card and i was away. nice big screen, i love it
customer_reviews.author: older53

customer_reviews.title: Item is like new. No signs of wear and scratch
customer_reviews.text: Item is like new. No signs of wear and scratch. Very good price for a good phone. But we all know the system is not perfect, but its not the phone mistake. However item was arrived quick. Better than expected about condition
customer_reviews.author: Csongi

customer_reviews.title: This was a great windows phone worked very well until it no longer ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great windows phone worked very well until it no longer charges and as its a fix battery you cant replace the battery less than 12 months old and it says i can not return it ?
customer_reviews.author: A. Cranston

customer_reviews.title: Generally not a bad item. I've ordered the BLU Win HD 5
customer_reviews.text: Generally not a bad item. I've ordered the BLU Win HD 5, but the first sim slot didn't work, so I've sent it back. It was replaced in a very correct way by Amazon. The new phone has had a far too low sound volume, All the updates were done. It was also sent back. It's a pitty, but 2 phones with different issues are enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Jaffe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with product cant complain battery life is outstanding for me compared to other branded phones
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not brilliant but ok
customer_reviews.text: its ok but quirky I think as it seems to be a bit temperamental too - I wouldn't recommend it but its ok for the money
customer_reviews.author: Mr. David Reiling

customer_reviews.title: Significant screen ghosting after two-three months. I missed the ...
customer_reviews.text: Significant screen ghosting after two-three months. I missed the window to return but I am sure as hell going to leave a negative review.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks good Took some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: Feels and looks good Took some getting used to. Cannot put on Google Keep or Amazon Music apps. Font size had to be changed because lettering so small, but those bits where font size cannot be altered, just too small to be read !!! But overall good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: chris v.

customer_reviews.title: great phone fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone it does everything i need it to, this was a stab in the dark really as i've always been an android user but thought this was a good way to try out windows without breaking the bank. I am so impressed it does everything my old phone does and more.
customer_reviews.author: jahas

customer_reviews.title: Much better than usual Android and up to 64gb memory
customer_reviews.text: Great for sharing Windows between devices. Bought extra 64gb memory and it's worth it. Good screen and reasonable battery charge. Great price when on offer.
customer_reviews.author: Eleni

customer_reviews.title: brillint phone seperate ringtones unavailable only problem
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product really happy with phone for the price. Windows operating system is really good and sharp. Only problem is you can not set separate ringtones for sim 1 and sim 2. Apart from that excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: sean devlin

customer_reviews.title: Great Dual-Sim feature
customer_reviews.text: Great Dual-Sim feature, works exactly as it should.. but - I still use my BB Z10 - just can't seem to frozen (let-it-go :-)
customer_reviews.author: G@ZZA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with phone good quality and great price just as good as more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine campbell

customer_reviews.title: poor poor poor
customer_reviews.text: Keeps turning off when charging and says low battery when fully charged also still awaiting the windows 10 update
customer_reviews.author: PAUL ADAMS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a brilliant buy took this phone on holiday worked brilliantly
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: I can't praise this phone enough - My samsung Galaxy ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't praise this phone enough - My samsung Galaxy fame is now recycled. Yes - there are less apps but this phone is effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, has the look and feel of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, has the look and feel of a phone 5x its value. Should have the option of larger pre-installed storage as the operating system uses up a large chunk of this once the updates are done, though an expandable memory slot is available. Decent camera, a few extra accessories make it an ideal phone to use especially if Windows Phones are your preferred choice.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 6 months but out side of amazon returns time so stuffed.
customer_reviews.text: only worked for 6 months and died now having to return to USA as warranty company in USA. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: mark silman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Windows 'phone for £50. Pay £100 if you have to, its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MR S DEVINE

customer_reviews.title: does everything I need it to do and as I am not technically minded I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money for this phone, does everything I need it to do and as I am not technically minded I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J. E. Quinney

customer_reviews.title: Buying cheap? Don't buy at all.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this phone. I've had to carry out 3 factory resets in the last 12 months to fix a battery firmware issue. Don't buy cheap, get a Samsung android phone if an Android smartphone is what you're after.
customer_reviews.author: David Hayman

customer_reviews.title: Good for temporary use.
customer_reviews.text: Phone is now slowing down. Does not charge with normal charger. I bought it for 79 pounds then a week later was 49 pounds. Very disappointed. End up buying iphone.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Happy with product but beware you need a Microsoft account to setup

customer_reviews.title: Very good 😊 phone but there is some apps that can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good 😊 phone but there is some apps that can't use with the phone 📱 and the camera 📷 not really bright,otherwise the phone 📱 it's ok 👌 for the value.

customer_reviews.title: All works. Amazingly fast. Just battery doesn't show real usage, if used as mobile router.
customer_reviews.text: All works. Amazingly fast. Just battery doesn't show real usage, if used as mobile router.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and practical with dual sim support.
customer_reviews.text: Although I had to send the first unit back due a fault the second one has been flawless. The dual sim works well allowing for personal and business calls to be unified into one device. In line for the Windows 10 upgrade I expect this phone to just get better and better.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Smith

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't gotten Windows 10 upgrade as promised. I and ...
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't gotten Windows 10 upgrade as promised. I and many others have tried contacting Blu about it and they never reply. The US version has gotten Windows 10 and there is very little difference between the US and EU version so it shouldn't be all that difficult.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this phone - a good build quality and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very, very happy with this phone - a good build quality and great value considering it is quite a high spec phone. A matching orange phone case and a screen protector were included so saved me some additional purchses!

product_meta.title: BLU Win HD 5" 4G Dual SIM-Free Smartphone - White
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:WhiteJoin the speedy world of LTE and Windows 8.1 with the colorful and powerful Win HD LTE. It features a brilliant 5-inch HD display, a lightning-fast quad-core 1.2 GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon 410 processor, and Windows Phone 8.1. This feather-light phone also has Dual SIMs and a microSD card slot, which gives you expandable storage capacity of up to 32GB on top of the 8GB of internal storage.

BOX CONTAINS
Headphones,USB Cable, Protective Case, Screen Protector
feature_bullets: 4G Dual Sim-Free Smartphone. Windows 8.1 Upgradeable to Windows 10
Qualcomm Snapdragon 410, 1.2GHz Quad-Core, 64 Bit Architecture and Adreno 306 GPU
5.0" IPS Display, 8MP Autofocus Rear Camera with LED Flash
1GB RAM, 8GB Storage, MicroSD Slot up to 64GB
